name: 蔡佩珊
objective:
本課程將探討新興科技在教學上的應用與設計，包含新興科技的介紹與實習、案例分析等，以培養發展新興科技運用於教學活動的概念與相關實作能力。
The course is intended as an introduction to the practical and design issues related to the application of technology into instruction, including the issues on the emerging technologies, instructional application and case study.
